00018 /*
00019  *      Data Encryption Standard
00020  *      D.P.Mitchell  83/06/08.
00021  *
00022  *      block_cipher(key, block, decrypting)
00023  */
00024 
00025 #ifdef SOLARIS2X
00026 #define bcopy(s, d, l)          memcpy(d, s, l)
00027 #define bcmp(s, d, l)           (memcmp(s, d, l)? 1 : 0)
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 static long     ip_low();
00031 static long     ip_high();
00032 static void     fp();
00033 void    des_key_setup();

00127 /*
00128  *      DES electronic codebook encryption of one block
00129  *       (quick version)
00130  */
00131 q_block_cipher(short_key, text, decrypting)
00132 char short_key[8];
00133 char text[8];
00134 int decrypting;
00135 {
00136         register char *key;
00137         register long temp;
00138         register long left, right;
00139         register i;
00140         register key_offset;
00141         int j,k;
00142         static int lk= -1;
00143         static char lastkey[4][8]={"xxxxxxx","xxxxxxx","xxxxxxx","xxxxxxx"};
00144         static char expanded_key[4][128];
00145 
00146         /* now caches 4 session keys.  drops least recently added  */
00147         k= -1;
00148         for (j=0; j<4; j++) {
00149                 if (bcmp(short_key,lastkey[j],8)==0) {
00150                         k=j;
00151                         break;
00152                 }
00153         }
00154         if (k<0) {
00155                 k= lk = (lk+1)%4;
00156                 bcopy(short_key,lastkey[k],8);
00157                 des_key_setup(short_key, expanded_key[k]);
00158         }
00159         key = expanded_key[k];
00160         left = ip_low(text);
00161         right = ip_high(text);
00162         if (decrypting) {
00163                 key_offset = 16 - 8;
00164                 key = key + 128 - 8;
00165         } else
00166                 key_offset = 0 - 8;
00167         for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00168                 temp = (right << 1) | ((right >> 31) & 1);
00169                 left ^= s0p[(temp         & 0x3f) ^ key[0]]
00170                       ^ s1p[((temp >>  4) & 0x3f) ^ key[1]]
00171                       ^ s2p[((temp >>  8) & 0x3f) ^ key[2]]
00172                       ^ s3p[((temp >> 12) & 0x3f) ^ key[3]]
00173                       ^ s4p[((temp >> 16) & 0x3f) ^ key[4]]
00174                       ^ s5p[((temp >> 20) & 0x3f) ^ key[5]]
00175                       ^ s6p[((temp >> 24) & 0x3f) ^ key[6]];
00176                 temp = ((right & 1) << 5) | ((right >> 27) & 0x1f);
00177                 left ^= s7p[temp ^ key[7]];
00178                 temp = left;
00179                 left = right;
00180                 right = temp;
00181                 key -= key_offset;
00182         }
00183         temp = left;
00184         left = right;
00185         right = temp;
00186         /*
00187          *      standard final permutation (IPI)
00188          */
00189         fp(left, right, text);
00190 }
00191 
00192 /*
00193  *      DES electronic codebook encryption of one block
00194  *       (expanded key version)
00195  */
00196 des_block_cipher(expanded_key, text, decrypting)
00197 char expanded_key[8];
00198 char text[8];
00199 int decrypting;
00200 {
00201         register char *key;
00202         register long temp;
00203         register long left, right;
00204         register i;
00205         register key_offset;
00206 
00207         key = expanded_key;
00208         left = ip_low(text);
00209         right = ip_high(text);
00210         if (decrypting) {
00211                 key_offset = 16 - 8;
00212                 key = key + 128 - 8;
00213         } else
00214                 key_offset = 0 - 8;
00215         for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00216                 temp = (right << 1) | ((right >> 31) & 1);
00217                 left ^= s0p[(temp         & 0x3f) ^ key[0]]
00218                       ^ s1p[((temp >>  4) & 0x3f) ^ key[1]]
00219                       ^ s2p[((temp >>  8) & 0x3f) ^ key[2]]
00220                       ^ s3p[((temp >> 12) & 0x3f) ^ key[3]]
00221                       ^ s4p[((temp >> 16) & 0x3f) ^ key[4]]
00222                       ^ s5p[((temp >> 20) & 0x3f) ^ key[5]]
00223                       ^ s6p[((temp >> 24) & 0x3f) ^ key[6]];
00224                 temp = ((right & 1) << 5) | ((right >> 27) & 0x1f);
00225                 left ^= s7p[temp ^ key[7]];
00226                 temp = left;
00227                 left = right;
00228                 right = temp;
00229                 key -= key_offset;
00230         }
00231         temp = left;
00232         left = right;
00233         right = temp;
00234         /*
00235          *      standard final permutation (IPI)
00236          */
00237         fp(left, right, text);
00238 }

00261 0x00000004,0x04000004,0x00040004,0x04040004,0x00000404,0x04000404,0x00040404,0x04040404,

00265 0x00000004,0x04000004,0x00040004,0x04040004,0x00000404,0x04000404,0x00040404,0x04040404,

00280 0x00000000,0x80000000,0x00800000,0x80800000,0x00008000,0x80008000,0x00808000,0x80808000,

00307 
00308 static void
00309 fp(left, right, text)
00310 long left, right;
00311 char text[8];
00312 {
00313         register unsigned long low, high;
00314         register unsigned long temp;
00315 
00316         temp = left;
00317         high = fph0[temp & 0xf];
00318         temp >>= 4;
00319         low  = fpl1[temp & 0xf];
00320         temp >>= 4;
00321         high |= fph2[temp & 0xf];
00322         temp >>= 4;
00323         low  |= fpl3[temp & 0xf];
00324         temp >>= 4;
00325         high |= fph4[temp & 0xf];
00326         temp >>= 4;
00327         low  |= fpl5[temp & 0xf];
00328         temp >>= 4;
00329         high |= fph6[temp & 0xf];
00330         temp >>= 4;
00331         low  |= fpl7[temp & 0xf];
00332         temp = right;
00333         high |= fph8[temp & 0xf];
00334         temp >>= 4;
00335         low  |= fpl9[temp & 0xf];
00336         temp >>= 4;
00337         high |= fpha[temp & 0xf];
00338         temp >>= 4;
00339         low  |= fplb[temp & 0xf];
00340         temp >>= 4;
00341         high |= fphc[temp & 0xf];
00342         temp >>= 4;
00343         low  |= fpld[temp & 0xf];
00344         temp >>= 4;
00345         high |= fphe[temp & 0xf];
00346         temp >>= 4;
00347         low  |= fplf[temp & 0xf];
00348         text[0] = low;
00349         text[1] = low >> 8;
00350         text[2] = low >> 16;
00351         text[3] = low >> 24;
00352         text[4] = high;
00353         text[5] = high >> 8;
00354         text[6] = high >> 16;
00355         text[7] = high >> 24;
00356 }
00357

00365 static long     iph0[16] = {

00367 0x00000000,0x00008000,0x00008000,0x00000000,0x00000000,0x00008000,0x00008000,0x00000080,

00369 static long     ipl1[16] = {
00370 0x00000000,
00371 0x80000000,0x00000000,0x80000000,0x00800000,0x80800000,0x00800000,0x80800000,0x00000000,
00372 0x80000000,0x00000000,0x80000000,0x00800000,0x80800000,0x00800000,0x80800000,};
00373 static long     iph1[16] = {
00374 0x00000000,
00375 0x00000000,0x80000000,0x80000000,0x00000000,0x00000000,0x80000000,0x80000000,0x00800000,
00376 0x00800000,0x80800000,0x80800000,0x00800000,0x00800000,0x80800000,0x80800000,};

00489 
00490 static long
00491 ip_low(block)
00492 register char block[8];
00493 {
00494         register long l;
00495 
00496         l  = ipl1[block[0] & 0xf];
00497         l |= ipl0[(block[0] >> 4) & 0xf];
00498         l |= ipl3[block[1] & 0xf];
00499         l |= ipl2[(block[1] >> 4) & 0xf];
00500         l |= ipl5[block[2] & 0xf];
00501         l |= ipl4[(block[2] >> 4) & 0xf];
00502         l |= ipl7[block[3] & 0xf];
00503         l |= ipl6[(block[3] >> 4) & 0xf];
00504         l |= ipl9[block[4] & 0xf];
00505         l |= ipl8[(block[4] >> 4) & 0xf];
00506         l |= iplb[block[5] & 0xf];
00507         l |= ipla[(block[5] >> 4) & 0xf];
00508         l |= ipld[block[6] & 0xf];
00509         l |= iplc[(block[6] >> 4) & 0xf];
00510         l |= iplf[block[7] & 0xf];
00511         l |= iple[(block[7] >> 4) & 0xf];
00512         return l;
00513 }
00514 
00515 static long
00516 ip_high(block)
00517 register char block[8];
00518 {
00519         register long l;
00520 
00521         l  = iph1[block[0] & 0xf];
00522         l |= iph0[(block[0] >> 4) & 0xf];
00523         l |= iph3[block[1] & 0xf];
00524         l |= iph2[(block[1] >> 4) & 0xf];
00525         l |= iph5[block[2] & 0xf];
00526         l |= iph4[(block[2] >> 4) & 0xf];
00527         l |= iph7[block[3] & 0xf];
00528         l |= iph6[(block[3] >> 4) & 0xf];
00529         l |= iph9[block[4] & 0xf];
00530         l |= iph8[(block[4] >> 4) & 0xf];
00531         l |= iphb[block[5] & 0xf];
00532         l |= ipha[(block[5] >> 4) & 0xf];
00533         l |= iphd[block[6] & 0xf];
00534         l |= iphc[(block[6] >> 4) & 0xf];
00535         l |= iphf[block[7] & 0xf];
00536         l |= iphe[(block[7] >> 4) & 0xf];
00537         return l;
00538 }
00539 
00540 /*
00541  *      Key set-up
00542  */
00543 
00544 void
00545 des_key_setup(key, subkeys)
00546 char key[8];
00547 char *subkeys;
00548 {
00549         register octet;
00550         register char *kp;
00551 
00552         kp = subkeys;
00553         octet = 16;
00554         do {
00555                 *kp++ = 0;      *kp++ = 0;
00556                 *kp++ = 0;      *kp++ = 0;
00557                 *kp++ = 0;      *kp++ = 0;
00558                 *kp++ = 0;      *kp++ = 0;
00559         } while (--octet);
00560         kp = subkeys;
00561         octet = key[0];
00562         if (octet & 0x80) {
00563                 kp[  3] |=  2; kp[  9] |=  8; kp[ 18] |=  8; 
00564                 kp[ 27] |= 32; kp[ 33] |=  2; kp[ 42] |= 16; 
00565                 kp[ 48] |=  8; kp[ 65] |= 16; kp[ 74] |=  2; 
00566                 kp[ 80] |=  2; kp[ 89] |=  4; kp[ 99] |= 16; 
00567                 kp[104] |=  4; kp[122] |= 32; 
00568         }
00569         if (octet & 0x40) {
00570                 kp[  1] |=  4; kp[  8] |=  1; kp[ 18] |=  4; 
00571                 kp[ 25] |= 32; kp[ 34] |= 32; kp[ 41] |=  8; 
00572                 kp[ 50] |=  8; kp[ 59] |= 32; kp[ 64] |= 16; 
00573                 kp[ 75] |=  4; kp[ 90] |=  1; kp[ 97] |= 16; 
00574                 kp[106] |=  2; kp[112] |=  2; kp[123] |=  1; 
00575         }
00576         if (octet & 0x20) {
00577                 kp[  2] |=  1; kp[ 19] |=  8; kp[ 35] |=  1; 
00578                 kp[ 40] |=  1; kp[ 50] |=  4; kp[ 57] |= 32; 
00579                 kp[ 75] |=  2; kp[ 80] |= 32; kp[ 89] |=  1; 
00580                 kp[ 96] |= 16; kp[107] |=  4; kp[120] |=  8; 
00581         }
00582         if (octet & 0x10) {
00583                 kp[  4] |= 32; kp[ 20] |=  2; kp[ 31] |=  4; 
00584                 kp[ 37] |= 32; kp[ 47] |=  1; kp[ 54] |=  1; 
00585                 kp[ 63] |=  2; kp[ 68] |=  1; kp[ 78] |=  4; 
00586                 kp[ 84] |=  8; kp[101] |= 16; kp[108] |=  4; 
00587                 kp[119] |= 16; kp[126] |=  8; 
00588         }
00589         if (octet & 0x8) {
00590                 kp[  5] |=  4; kp[ 15] |=  4; kp[ 21] |= 32; 
00591                 kp[ 31] |=  1; kp[ 38] |=  1; kp[ 47] |=  2; 
00592                 kp[ 53] |=  2; kp[ 68] |=  8; kp[ 85] |= 16; 
00593                 kp[ 92] |=  4; kp[103] |= 16; kp[108] |= 32; 
00594                 kp[118] |= 32; kp[124] |=  2; 
00595         }
00596         if (octet & 0x4) {
00597                 kp[ 15] |=  2; kp[ 21] |=  2; kp[ 39] |=  8; 
00598                 kp[ 46] |= 16; kp[ 55] |= 32; kp[ 61] |=  1; 
00599                 kp[ 71] |= 16; kp[ 76] |= 32; kp[ 86] |= 32; 
00600                 kp[ 93] |=  4; kp[102] |=  2; kp[108] |= 16; 
00601                 kp[117] |=  8; kp[126] |=  1; 
00602         }
00603         if (octet & 0x2) {
00604                 kp[ 14] |= 16; kp[ 23] |= 32; kp[ 29] |=  1; 
00605                 kp[ 38] |=  8; kp[ 52] |=  2; kp[ 63] |=  4; 
00606                 kp[ 70] |=  2; kp[ 76] |= 16; kp[ 85] |=  8; 
00607                 kp[100] |=  1; kp[110] |=  4; kp[116] |=  8; 
00608                 kp[127] |=  8; 
00609         }
00610         octet = key[1];
00611         if (octet & 0x80) {
00612                 kp[  1] |=  8; kp[  8] |= 32; kp[ 17] |=  1; 
00613                 kp[ 24] |= 16; kp[ 35] |=  4; kp[ 50] |=  1; 
00614                 kp[ 57] |= 16; kp[ 67] |=  8; kp[ 83] |=  1; 
00615                 kp[ 88] |=  1; kp[ 98] |=  4; kp[105] |= 32; 
00616                 kp[114] |= 32; kp[123] |=  2; 
00617         }
00618         if (octet & 0x40) {
00619                 kp[  0] |=  1; kp[ 11] |= 16; kp[ 16] |=  4; 
00620                 kp[ 35] |=  2; kp[ 40] |= 32; kp[ 49] |=  1; 
00621                 kp[ 56] |= 16; kp[ 65] |=  2; kp[ 74] |= 16; 
00622                 kp[ 80] |=  8; kp[ 99] |=  8; kp[115] |=  1;

00633                 kp[ 14] |= 32; kp[ 21] |=  4; kp[ 30] |=  2; 
00634                 kp[ 36] |= 16; kp[ 45] |=  8; kp[ 60] |=  1;

00643                 kp[ 87] |= 32; kp[ 93] |=  1; kp[102] |=  8;

00647                 kp[  7] |=  2; kp[ 12] |=  1; kp[ 22] |=  4;

00649                 kp[ 63] |= 16; kp[ 70] |=  8; kp[ 84] |=  2; 
00650                 kp[ 95] |=  4; kp[101] |= 32; kp[111] |=  1; 
00651                 kp[118] |=  1;

00654                 kp[  6] |= 16; kp[ 13] |= 16; kp[ 20] |=  4;

00675         if (octet & 0x20) {
00676                 kp[  1] |= 16; kp[ 11] |=  8; kp[ 27] |=  1;

00678                 kp[ 58] |= 32; kp[ 67] |=  2; kp[ 72] |= 32;

00683                 kp[  6] |= 32; kp[ 12] |=  2; kp[ 23] |=  4;

00958 
00959 void
00960 key_crunch(buffer, size, key)
00961   char buffer[], key[];
00962   int size;
00963 {
00964     int i;
00965     struct {long fo; char key[9];} s;
00966 
00967     bcopy("encrypt!",s.key,8);
00968 
00969     for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00970         key[i] = 0;
00971     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00972         key[(i & 7)] ^= buffer[i];
00973         if ((i & 7) == 7)
00974             q_block_cipher(s.key, key, 0);
00975     }
00976     q_block_cipher(s.key, key, 0);
00977 }
